verses.text: \w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w went|strong="G4198"\w* unto \w mount|strong="G3735"\w* Olivet.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w early|strong="G3722"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w morning|strong="G3722"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w temple|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w people|strong="G2992"\w* \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w sitting|strong="G2523"\w* \w down|strong="G2523"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w taught|strong="G1321"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w scribes|strong="G1122"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Pharisees|strong="G5330"\w* \w bring|strong="G0071"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w woman|strong="G1135"\w* taken \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w adultery|strong="G3430"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w set|strong="G2476"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w midst|strong="G3319"\w*,

\w And|strong="G1135"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: Master, \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w woman|strong="G1135"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w even|strong="G0846"\w* \w now|strong="G0846"\w* taken \w in|strong="G3004"\w* \w adultery|strong="G3431"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w Moses|strong="G3475"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w* \w commanded|strong="G1781"\w* \w us|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w stone|strong="G3036"\w* \w such|strong="G5108"\w* \w a|strong="G5108"\w* \w one|strong="G3588"\w*. \w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* sayest thou?

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* tempting \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* might \w accuse|strong="G2723"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*. \w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* bowing \w himself|strong="G0846"\w* \w down|strong="G2736"\w*, \w wrote|strong="G1125"\w* \w with|strong="G1519"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w finger|strong="G1147"\w* \w on|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w ground|strong="G1093"\w*.

\w When|strong="G5613"\w* \w therefore|strong="G1161"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w continued|strong="G1961"\w* \w asking|strong="G2065"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w he|strong="G0846"\w* lifted up \w himself|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*: \w He|strong="G0846"\w* \w that|strong="G3004"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w without|strong="G0361"\w* \w sin|strong="G0361"\w* \w among|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, \w let|strong="G3004"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w first|strong="G4413"\w* \w cast|strong="G0906"\w* \w a|strong="G5613"\w* \w stone|strong="G3037"\w* \w at|strong="G1909"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w* stooping \w down|strong="G2736"\w*, \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w wrote|strong="G1125"\w* \w on|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w ground|strong="G1093"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w hearing|strong="G0191"\w* \w this|strong="G3588"\w*, \w went|strong="G1831"\w* \w out|strong="G1831"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w*, \w beginning|strong="G0756"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* eldest. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w alone|strong="G3441"\w* remained, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w woman|strong="G1135"\w* \w standing|strong="G2476"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w midst|strong="G3319"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* lifting up \w himself|strong="G0846"\w*, \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w*: \w Woman|strong="G1135"\w*, \w where|strong="G4226"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w that|strong="G1565"\w* accused thee? Hath \w no|strong="G3762"\w* \w man|strong="G3762"\w* \w condemned|strong="G2632"\w* thee?

\w Who|strong="G3588"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*: \w No|strong="G3762"\w* \w man|strong="G3762"\w*, \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*: \w Neither|strong="G3761"\w* \w will|strong="G2962"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w condemn|strong="G2632"\w* thee. \w Go|strong="G4198"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w now|strong="G1161"\w* \w sin|strong="G0264"\w* \w no|strong="G3762"\w* \w more|strong="G3371"\w*.

\w Again|strong="G3825"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w*, \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w spoke|strong="G2980"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*: \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w am|strong="G1510"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w light|strong="G5457"\w* \w of|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w world|strong="G2889"\w*: \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w that|strong="G3004"\w* followeth \w me|strong="G3004"\w*, walketh \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w darkness|strong="G4653"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w shall|strong="G5457"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w light|strong="G5457"\w* \w of|strong="G1722"\w* \w life|strong="G2222"\w*.

\w The|strong="G3588"\w* \w Pharisees|strong="G5330"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: Thou givest \w testimony|strong="G3141"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* thyself: thy \w testimony|strong="G3141"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w true|strong="G0227"\w*.

\w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*: \w Although|strong="G3748"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w give|strong="G3004"\w* \w testimony|strong="G3141"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w myself|strong="G1683"\w*, \w my|strong="G3754"\w* \w testimony|strong="G3141"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w true|strong="G0227"\w*: \w for|strong="G3754"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w know|strong="G1492"\w* whence \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w came|strong="G2064"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* whither \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w go|strong="G5217"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* whence \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w come|strong="G2064"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* whither \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w go|strong="G5217"\w*.

\w You|strong="G5210"\w* \w judge|strong="G2919"\w* \w according|strong="G2596"\w* \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*: \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w judge|strong="G2919"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w any|strong="G3762"\w* \w man|strong="G3762"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w if|strong="G1437"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w do|strong="G2919"\w* \w judge|strong="G2919"\w*, \w my|strong="G1699"\w* \w judgment|strong="G2920"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w true|strong="G0228"\w*: \w because|strong="G3754"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w am|strong="G1510"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w alone|strong="G3441"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Father|strong="G3962"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w sent|strong="G3992"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w your|strong="G2532"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w* \w it|strong="G1161"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w written|strong="G1125"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w testimony|strong="G3141"\w* \w of|strong="G3551"\w* \w two|strong="G1417"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w true|strong="G0227"\w*.

\w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w am|strong="G1510"\w* \w one|strong="G3588"\w* \w that|strong="G3140"\w* give \w testimony|strong="G3140"\w* \w of|strong="G3962"\w* \w myself|strong="G1683"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Father|strong="G3962"\w* \w that|strong="G3140"\w* \w sent|strong="G3992"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w* giveth \w testimony|strong="G3140"\w* \w of|strong="G3962"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w*.

\w They|strong="G0846"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: \w Where|strong="G4226"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* thy \w Father|strong="G3962"\w*? \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w*: \w Neither|strong="G3777"\w* \w me|strong="G3004"\w* \w do|strong="G1492"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w* \w know|strong="G1492"\w*, \w nor|strong="G3777"\w* \w my|strong="G3004"\w* \w Father|strong="G3962"\w*: \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w* \w did|strong="G1492"\w* \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w me|strong="G3004"\w*, perhaps \w you|strong="G4771"\w* \w would|strong="G0302"\w* \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w my|strong="G3004"\w* \w Father|strong="G3962"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w*.

\w These|strong="G3778"\w* \w words|strong="G4487"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G0846"\w* \w spoke|strong="G2980"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w treasury|strong="G1049"\w*, \w teaching|strong="G1321"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w temple|strong="G2413"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w no|strong="G3762"\w* \w man|strong="G3778"\w* laid hands \w on|strong="G1722"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w because|strong="G3754"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w hour|strong="G5610"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w not|strong="G3762"\w* \w yet|strong="G2532"\w* \w come|strong="G2064"\w*.

\w Again|strong="G3825"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G0846"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*: \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w go|strong="G5217"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* \w seek|strong="G2212"\w* \w me|strong="G3004"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* \w die|strong="G0599"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w your|strong="G2532"\w* \w sin|strong="G0266"\w*. Whither \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w go|strong="G5217"\w*, \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w cannot|strong="G3756"\w* \w come|strong="G2064"\w*.

\w The|strong="G3588"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*: \w Will|strong="G3748"\w* \w he|strong="G3754"\w* \w kill|strong="G0615"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w*, \w because|strong="G3754"\w* \w he|strong="G3754"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*: Whither \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w go|strong="G5217"\w*, \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w cannot|strong="G3756"\w* \w come|strong="G2064"\w*?

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*: \w You|strong="G5210"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* beneath, \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w am|strong="G1510"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w above|strong="G0507"\w*. \w You|strong="G5210"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w world|strong="G2889"\w*, \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w am|strong="G1510"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w world|strong="G2889"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* shall \w die|strong="G0599"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w your|strong="G1437"\w* \w sins|strong="G0266"\w*. \w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w if|strong="G1437"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w believe|strong="G4100"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w am|strong="G1510"\w* \w he|strong="G3754"\w*, \w you|strong="G5210"\w* shall \w die|strong="G0599"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w your|strong="G1437"\w* \w sin|strong="G0266"\w*.

\w They|strong="G0846"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: \w Who|strong="G3739"\w* art thou? \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*: \w The|strong="G3588"\w* \w beginning|strong="G0746"\w*, \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w speak|strong="G2980"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5210"\w*.

\w Many|strong="G4183"\w* \w things|strong="G3778"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w speak|strong="G2980"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w judge|strong="G2919"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*. \w But|strong="G0235"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w sent|strong="G3992"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w*, \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w true|strong="G0227"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w things|strong="G3778"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w same|strong="G0846"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w speak|strong="G2980"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w world|strong="G2889"\w*.

\w And|strong="G3962"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w understood|strong="G1097"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w called|strong="G3004"\w* \w God|strong="G0846"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w Father|strong="G3962"\w*.

\w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w them|strong="G4160"\w*: \w When|strong="G3752"\w* \w you|strong="G3752"\w* \w shall|strong="G0444"\w* \w have|strong="G1510"\w* \w lifted|strong="G5312"\w* up \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* \w of|strong="G5207"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w*, \w then|strong="G2532"\w* \w shall|strong="G0444"\w* \w you|strong="G3752"\w* \w know|strong="G1097"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w am|strong="G1510"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w do|strong="G4160"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3762"\w* \w of|strong="G5207"\w* \w myself|strong="G1683"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w as|strong="G2531"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Father|strong="G3962"\w* hath \w taught|strong="G1321"\w* \w me|strong="G3004"\w*, \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w things|strong="G3778"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w speak|strong="G2980"\w*:

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w sent|strong="G3992"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w*, \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* hath \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w left|strong="G0863"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w* \w alone|strong="G3441"\w*: \w for|strong="G3754"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w do|strong="G4160"\w* \w always|strong="G3842"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w things|strong="G0846"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* please \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w When|strong="G0846"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w spoke|strong="G2980"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w things|strong="G3778"\w*, \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w believed|strong="G4100"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G3767"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w those|strong="G3588"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w believed|strong="G4100"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: \w If|strong="G1437"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w continue|strong="G3306"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w my|strong="G1699"\w* \w word|strong="G3056"\w*, \w you|strong="G5210"\w* shall \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w my|strong="G1699"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w indeed|strong="G0230"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* \w know|strong="G1097"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w truth|strong="G0225"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w truth|strong="G0225"\w* \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* \w make|strong="G1659"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w free|strong="G1659"\w*.
